item.title: The Economist on McCain's judgment
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: The Economist on McCain/Palin: "One of the biggest problems with the Bush administration is that it appointed so many incompetents because they were sound on Roe v Wade. Mrs Palin's elevation suggests that, far from breaking with Mr Bush, Mr McCain is repeating his mistakes." McCain would rather screw the country than lose an election.
